channel.title: World
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from World, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Covid-19 inquiry live: Rishi Sunak faces questions on the goverment’s pandemic response
item.description: Sunak says he was surprised to have been made chancellor in February 2020 Sunak said speed was “paramount” as “one thing that was crystal clear that t...

item.title: Bondi beach shooting live updates: Anthony Albanese says ‘no evidence’ alleged shooters were part of a cell; mourners gather at site of attack as floral tribute grows
item.description: Follow live Full report Victims named so far What we know about the terrorist attack Amid the horror of the shooting, one video has emerged showing in...

item.title: Oxfam GB chief reportedly forced out over ‘serious issues’ with her leadership
item.description: Independent review into Dr Halima Begum’s conduct was prompted by at least 100 staff writing to trustees Oxfam GB’s chief executive has been forced ou...

item.title: Government announces extra funding for safe housing for domestic abuse survivors – UK politics live
item.description: As part of the violence against women and girls (VAWG) strategy councils will receive a further £19m Danny Kruger , the Reform UK MP in charge of the ...

item.title: Ukraine-US talks to continue in Berlin as Ukraine willing to drop Nato ambitions – Europe live
item.description: Zelenskyy said that while Ukraine was prepared to drop its Nato aspirations, it would still require security guarantees from US and Europe We are also...

item.title: Oxfam chief forced to step down after accusations of bullying
item.description: The charity's trustees say Dr Halima Begum's position was "untenable" following an independent review of her behaviour.

item.title: 'Hero' who wrestled gun from shooter named as Ahmed al Ahmed
item.description: Fruit shop owner Ahmed al Ahmed, 43, has undergone surgery for bullet wounds to his arm and hand.

item.title: Sir Cliff Richard reveals prostate cancer treatment
item.description: The 85-year-old singer says his cancer has "gone at the moment", but calls for better screenings.

item.title: Russia poses acute threat, new MI6 chief to warn
item.description: Blaise Metreweli will say the threat is posed by "an aggressive, expansionist and revisionist Russia".

item.title: Dozens killed in Morocco flash floods
item.description: At least 70 homes have been inundated in Safi's old city centre, officials say.
